title: (LFM) Silver/Gold Players
body:
Hey, our ranked team is looking for 3 new players

The idea behind the team is to create a positive environment where we can all enjoy ourselves and play in a team that compliments us. 
In terms of players, positive attitudes and flexibility across roles are probably the biggest factors. The players we already have play various roles, and so the rotation of roles is probably a target.  Ideally players who are silver/gold.
Skype and being free to play most evenings would be perfect, although we're able to sort things like that out.

Feel free to message me in -game: BVB

replies.body: I'm silver 1 and can play any role. My ign is StroudWing.
ADC main here ign Frost09 I'm climbing quickly atm s3 but plan on doing a mega duo marathon with friend on weekend to get gold
